data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ultimate NPCs: Skulduggery (5E)
data.detailed_description:
Ultimate NPCs - Skullduggery (5E)


This book was written to be a resource to Game Masters and Players alike. It contains a wealth of information for developing plot points, character behaviors, histories, guilds, and many other valuable assets designed to aid in the running and playing of fantasy role playing games.

This module includes 30 finely crafted NPCs at levels 1, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20 making 180 unique characters with:

  • back stories
  • personality traits
  • role playing cues
  • unique items
  • unique spells
  • Including 8 generic NPCs

Requires: An active subscription or 1-time standard or Ultimate license of Fantasy Grounds and the included 5E ruleset.

Conversion by: James Holloway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
